Text.val: 21.09.2004 JJ SCR6203 Replaced pi.QUSR_ID by pi.Query ID
This replaces support for starting of saved queries (was not used)
by support of multiple query definitions (based on DEBC or CLNT or ...)
21.07.2004 JJ SCR6656 changed SAVE_TEMP_CRITERIUM to use KEYWORD_ID
Program generates xml request for OXA400C
1 invalid user (no HUSR for pi or user(0))
Get user defaults for missing parameters and user existence check
If result file name empty use same as XML file but with extension .csv
Language stil empty .. don't care (for now) nothing is done with language
